entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
